efforts.name: Data Infrastructure Setup
efforts.description: Establish foundational data infrastructure and tools for collecting, storing, and processing data

projects.name: Data Storage Setup
projects.description: Set up data storage solutions for your organization

tasks.title: ⭐ Assess data storage needs
tasks.description: Evaluate what types of data you'll be storing, volume estimates, and access patterns. Consider structured, unstructured, and time-series data.

tasks.title: Choose storage solution
tasks.description: Select appropriate storage (databases, data lakes, cloud storage). Consider PostgreSQL, MongoDB, S3, or cloud data warehouses.

tasks.title: Set up initial database
tasks.description: Create your primary database instance. Configure basic settings, security, and access controls.

tasks.title: Configure backup strategy
tasks.description: Set up automated backups for your data. Define retention policies and recovery procedures.

tasks.title: Implement access controls
tasks.description: Configure user permissions and roles. Ensure proper security for sensitive data.

tasks.title: Set up monitoring
tasks.description: Configure monitoring for database performance, storage usage, and health metrics.

projects.name: Data Collection Tools
projects.description: Set up tools and processes for collecting data from various sources

tasks.title: ⭐ Identify data sources
tasks.description: List all sources of data you need to collect from. Include APIs, databases, files, web scraping, and user inputs.

tasks.title: Set up API integrations
tasks.description: Configure API connections to external data sources. Handle authentication and rate limiting.

tasks.title: Create data ingestion scripts
tasks.description: Write scripts to collect data from various sources. Include error handling and retry logic.

tasks.title: Set up scheduled data collection
tasks.description: Configure automated schedules for regular data collection. Use cron jobs or workflow tools.

tasks.title: Implement data validation
tasks.description: Add validation checks to ensure data quality during collection. Check for required fields and data types.

tasks.title: Create data collection logs
tasks.description: Set up logging to track data collection activities, errors, and success rates.

efforts.name: Data Quality & Governance
efforts.description: Establish processes to ensure data quality, accuracy, and proper governance

projects.name: Data Quality Framework
projects.description: Create processes and tools to maintain high data quality

tasks.title: ⭐ Define data quality standards
tasks.description: Establish criteria for data quality: completeness, accuracy, consistency, timeliness, and validity.

tasks.title: Create data validation rules
tasks.description: Define validation rules for different data types and fields. Include format checks, range validation, and business rules.

tasks.title: Implement data quality checks
tasks.description: Build automated checks to validate data quality. Run checks during ingestion and periodically.

tasks.title: Set up data quality monitoring
tasks.description: Create dashboards and alerts to monitor data quality metrics. Track quality trends over time.

tasks.title: Create data cleaning procedures
tasks.description: Document and automate procedures for cleaning and correcting data quality issues.

tasks.title: Establish quality reporting
tasks.description: Generate regular reports on data quality metrics. Share with stakeholders and track improvements.

projects.name: Data Governance
projects.description: Establish policies and processes for data management and compliance

tasks.title: ⭐ Create data governance policy
tasks.description: Document policies for data access, usage, retention, and privacy. Define roles and responsibilities.

tasks.title: Classify data sensitivity
tasks.description: Categorize data by sensitivity level (public, internal, confidential, restricted). Apply appropriate controls.

tasks.title: Implement data retention policies
tasks.description: Define how long different types of data should be retained. Set up automated deletion for expired data.

tasks.title: Create data access controls
tasks.description: Implement role-based access control. Ensure users only access data they're authorized to see.

tasks.title: Document data lineage
tasks.description: Track where data comes from and how it's transformed. Create documentation of data flows.

tasks.title: Set up audit logging
tasks.description: Log all data access and modifications. Enable tracking of who accessed what data and when.

efforts.name: Analytics & Reporting
efforts.description: Build analytics capabilities and reporting infrastructure

projects.name: Analytics Setup
projects.description: Set up tools and processes for data analysis

tasks.title: ⭐ Choose analytics tools
tasks.description: Select analytics tools that fit your needs. Consider SQL tools, Python/R, BI platforms, or specialized analytics tools.

tasks.title: Set up analytics environment
tasks.description: Configure your analytics workspace. Install necessary tools, libraries, and connect to data sources.

tasks.title: Create data models
tasks.description: Design data models optimized for analytics. Create views, aggregations, and dimensional models.

tasks.title: Build key metrics
tasks.description: Define and calculate key business metrics. Create reusable metric definitions and calculations.

tasks.title: Set up exploratory analysis
tasks.description: Create notebooks or scripts for exploratory data analysis. Enable ad-hoc analysis capabilities.

tasks.title: Document analytics processes
tasks.description: Document how to perform common analyses. Create guides and templates for repeatable analyses.

projects.name: Reporting Infrastructure
projects.description: Build automated reporting and dashboard capabilities

tasks.title: ⭐ Identify reporting needs
tasks.description: List all reports and dashboards needed by different stakeholders. Prioritize by importance and frequency.

tasks.title: Create report templates
tasks.description: Design templates for common reports. Include standard formats, visualizations, and key metrics.

tasks.title: Build automated reports
tasks.description: Automate generation of regular reports. Schedule reports to run and distribute automatically.

tasks.title: Set up dashboards
tasks.description: Create interactive dashboards for key metrics. Enable self-service analytics for stakeholders.

tasks.title: Implement report distribution
tasks.description: Set up systems to distribute reports to stakeholders. Use email, shared drives, or reporting portals.

tasks.title: Gather feedback and iterate
tasks.description: Collect feedback on reports and dashboards. Continuously improve based on user needs.
